word: Will you be justified in uttering expressions of ill feeling and ill repute against those whom we suppose have erred?  Have we never made any mistakes ourselves?  Have we never been in the slough of despond?  God help us to bear in mind how hard it is when tempted of the devil to have our own brethren step on the side of the devil, and try to hurt and destroy. When tempted to speak words of faultfinding, begin to sing, "Praise ye the Lord."-- Ms 129, 1901.
